body_html:
When you say

I don't have any clue about using the tf.train.RMSPropOptimizer

Do you mean tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer? I'll assume you do.

In any case, I'm not sure how to handle this. I think if you use three SyncReplicasOptimizer, each wrapping an optimizer, everything will work, but I'm not sure. /CC @ispirmustafa @panyx0718, any ideas?

body:
When you say
> I don't have any clue about using the tf.train.RMSPropOptimizer

Do you mean tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer? I'll assume you do.

In any case, I'm not sure how to handle this. I think if you use three SyncReplicasOptimizer, each wrapping an optimizer, everything will work, but I'm not sure. /CC @ispirmustafa @panyx0718, any ideas?
